divs: Sighting DetailsI was working on a bulk carrier on lake huron between canada and the us , as we were on deck closing cargo hold hatches I looked up to the port side we were travelling north about half way up the lake , and I witnesses a glowing tranparent sphere. Yellow gold in colour around 8 o'clock at night as I viewed this object it looked like what I thought was the moon but the moon was clearly visible.so I called over two of my crewmates. Who also witnessed this event and as we were looking at it wondering. It changed shape from orb to horizontal spinning vortes which continued for about a min the back to small or and dissintegrated pretty quickly.
trends: There have been no other sightings in lake huron half way north
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: glowing yellow gold sphere turned into vortex and dissintegrated over lake huron
